settings.title: Alfa Laval SBV Sanitary Ball Valve
settings.content:
The Alfa Laval Sanitary Ball Valve (SBV) is a hygienic valve with a full-bore design, matching the pipeline diameter to ensure efficient flow with no restrictions or pressure drops. This feature makes it ideal for handling high-viscosity or particulate liquids, and it is also well-suited for pigging systems to minimize product waste and enhance plant performance.

  • Reliable full-flow performance, especially for pigging
    systems
  • Compact, straightforward hygienic design
  • Versatile operation with automated or manual control
  • Durable and water hammer-safe
  • Easy to clean (optional cavity filler or cavity cleaning

The Alfa Laval SBV serves as an ideal hygienic product valve in various industries, including dairy, food, beverage, brewery, chemical, and more.
